direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods generate body content for SIP messages but in different formats (String vs. byte array).
Both methods generate SIP-related content (body vs. name address) but serve different purposes.
Both methods generate SIP-related content but for different parts of the SIP message (body vs. method).
Both methods access and generate SIP-related content types, though for different purposes.
Both methods modify the state of the SIP message by adding specific details (body vs. RTP port).

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the port pool is required before generating the body string.
Resolving keys is required before generating the body string.
Both methods verify the format of SIP-related content and handle similar exceptions.
